text.name: easyDevControls_loadError
text.text: 无法加载或不支持由%s创建的Mod%s！ 为了避免错误，应该删除此mod！ 访问下面的Giants modHub下载链接以获取最新的官方版本.

text.name: easyDevControls_typePrePlacedPlaceables
text.text: 预先放置的可放置物品

text.name: easyDevControls_ignoreRemoveIfEmptyMessage
text.text: Fill level of '%s' set to 0, would you like to ignore delete on empty flag?

text.name: easyDevControls_serverRequestMessage
text.text: Requesting update from server, please wait.

text.name: easyDevControls_setTimeWarning
text.text: Are you sure you want to advance time by %s and %s?

text.name: easyDevControls_timeScaleWarning
text.text: Setting Month, Day or Hour is only possible when time scale is set to '%s' or lower!

text.name: easyDevControls_setFOVAngleWarning
text.text: Failed to set field of view (FOV), %s is not a valid value!

text.name: easyDevControls_invalidTeleportWarning
text.text: Invalid X / Z coordinates! List only X and Z positions separated by a space.

text.name: easyDevControls_emptyTeleportWarning
text.text: First enter valid X / Z coordinates in box or choose field number from list!

text.name: easyDevControls_extraTimescalesWarning
text.text: Using timescales greater than 5000x may have a negative effect on the base game and custom scripts. It is recommended to only use extra fast time scales for testing purposes!

text.name: easyDevControls_resetPageWarning
text.text: Are you sure you want to reset the current page to default settings?

text.name: easyDevControls_resetPermissionsWarning
text.text: Are you sure you want to reset all permissions to default?

text.name: easyDevControls_invalidFarmVehicleWarning
text.text: Selected vehicle does not belong to your farm!

text.name: easyDevControls_setPowerConsumerWarning
text.text: No implement selected or implement is not a power consumer!

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleAnalyseWarning
text.text:
Attempting to analysing selected vehicle '%s'.
Make sure vehicle is positioned on a flat plane that is parallel to x/z plane for best results.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleAnalyseFailedWarning
text.text: Failed to analyse vehicle, invalid or no vehicle found!

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllObjectsWarning
text.text: Are you sure you would like to remove all %s from the map?

text.name: easyDevControls_modConflictWarning
text.text: Function disabled due to conflict with mod '%s' by %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_failedToSpawnObjectWarning
text.text: Failed to spawn %s! Please try again.

text.name: easyDevControls_flightModeStateOnInfo
text.text: Flight state: %s (Change altitude using keys Q and E)

text.name: easyDevControls_hudInputOnInfo
text.text: Hud input binding on (Toggle the hud visibility using input '%s')

text.name: easyDevControls_flipVehiclesInfo
text.text: Attempting to correct vehicle orientation and the orientation of any connected implement.

text.name: easyDevControls_resetFovAngleInfo
text.text: Field of view reset to default value %d°.

text.name: easyDevControls_stopTimeInfo
text.text: Timescale has been set to zero.

text.name: easyDevControls_addMoneyHelp
text.text: Adds money to your farm account balance.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeMoneyHelp
text.text: Removes money from your farms account balance.

text.name: easyDevControls_setMoneyHelp
text.text: Sets the balance of your farms account to the given value.

text.name: easyDevControls_flightModeToggleHelp
text.text: Toggles the player flight debug mode.

text.name: easyDevControls_flightModeStateHelp
text.text: Only available when 'Flight Mode' is enabled, this feature can also be toggled in game by using the J key. Once active the players altitude can be changed using keys Q and E

text.name: easyDevControls_hudVisibilityHelp
text.text: Sets the visibility of the hud.

text.name: easyDevControls_hudInputHelp
text.text: Toggles the availability of the 'Toggle hud' input binding.

text.name: easyDevControls_teleportHelp
text.text: Teleport the player, entered vehicles or a vehicle in range of the player to a selected map point, centre of a field or to a given x / z position.

text.name: easyDevControls_flipVehiclesHelp
text.text: Attempts to correct orientation of a vehicle and the orientation of any connected implements. This operation is available for entered vehicles or when looking at a valid vehicle.

text.name: easyDevControls_deleteObjectsKeyHelp
text.text:
Toggles the availability of the 'Delete Objects' input binding. This allows the player to delete a tree, log, stump, bale, pallet or vehicle that they are looking at. Tree and Stump information will also be displayed when active.
Note: Feature is only available to the 'Master Users / Admin'!

text.name: easyDevControls_setFOVAngleHelp
text.text: Sets the 'Field Of View' (FOV) of the current camera. Use '-1' or 'Reset Button' to return the cameras to its default value.

text.name: easyDevControls_setQualityHelp
text.text: Adjusts the following settings to allow for high quality screenshots or as required.

text.name: easyDevControls_extraTimescalesHelp
text.text: Toggles the availability of the following extra timescales: %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_stopTimeHelp
text.text: Sets the current timescale to zero.

text.name: easyDevControls_showCollectablesHelp
text.text: Adjusts at what percentage the collectables will be displayed on the map. Note: Currently for 'Single Player' use only.

text.name: easyDevControls_clearI3DCacheHelp
text.text: Removes all cached i3d files to ensure the latest versions are loaded from disk. When there is no shared i3d files available this function will be disabled.

text.name: easyDevControls_superStrengthOnInfo
text.text: Player now has super strength and increased pickup range

text.name: easyDevControls_superStrengthHelp
text.text: Toggles the super strength function and extends the players pickup range.

text.name: easyDevControls_jumpMultiplierHelp
text.text: Increases the jumping height of the player by adding the selected multiplier.

text.name: easyDevControls_thirdPersonViewHelp
text.text:
Toggles player third person view.
Note: This mode is designed for screenshots and not all game functions such as 'Hand Tools' will operate correctly while enabled.

text.name: easyDevControls_woodCuttingMarkerHelp
text.text: Toggles the visibility of the chainsaw woodcutting marker.

text.name: easyDevControls_aimOverlayHelp
text.text: Toggles the visibility of the aim marker.

text.name: easyDevControls_runSpeedHelp
text.text: Sets the multiplier that will be used when 'Increased running speed' is 'On'.

text.name: easyDevControls_runSpeedStateHelp
text.text: Toggles the running speed state. When 'Off' the player will walk and run at default speeds.

text.name: easyDevControls_runSpeedKeyHelp
text.text: Toggles the availability of the 'Increased running speed' input binding.

text.name: easyDevControls_setFarmHelp
text.text: Sets the players current farm or changes a vehicles farm owner.

text.name: easyDevControls_playerFsmDebugHelp
text.text: Toggles player state machine debug information.

text.name: easyDevControls_playerFsmStateJumpDebugHelp
text.text: Toggles player jump state machine debug information. Jump height / duration will be printed to the log file.

text.name: easyDevControls_tipToGroundInfo
text.text: Successfully tipped %s of %s at a length of %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_clearTipAreaRadiusInfo
text.text: Successfully cleared %s height type at a radius of %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_clearTipAreaMapInfo
text.text: Successfully cleared map of %s height type.

text.name: easyDevControls_addBaleHelp
text.text: Adds a given bale type in front of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_availableBaleTypesHelp
text.text: Displays a list of available bale types.

text.name: easyDevControls_fermentingBalesHelp
text.text: Displays a list of all fermenting bales owned by the current farm.

text.name: easyDevControls_showBaleLocationsHelp
text.text: Displays all farm owned bales as hotspots on the map.

text.name: easyDevControls_showPalletLocationsHelp
text.text: Displays all farm owned pallets as hotspots on the map.

text.name: easyDevControls_addPalletHelp
text.text: Adds a selected pallet type in front of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_addLogHelp
text.text: Adds a selected log type and the given length in front of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_tipToTriggerHelp
text.text: Tips a product to a trigger that the player is currently standing on.

text.name: easyDevControls_tipToGroundHelp
text.text: Tips the given amount of a fillType to the ground at a length of 1 > 25 meters.

text.name: easyDevControls_clearTipAreaHelp
text.text: Clears 'all' or a 'selected' fillType from the ground at the given radius.

text.name: easyDevControls_showTipCollisionsHelp
text.text:
Displays the following ground tip collisions.
Green: Bit Vectors <= 0 Blue: Bit Vectors > 0 or <= 1 Red: Bit Vectors > 1

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllBalesHelp
text.text: Removes all bales from the map!

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllPalletsHelp
text.text: Removes all pallets from the map!

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllLogsHelp
text.text: Removes all logs from the map!

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllStumpsHelp
text.text: Removes all stumps from the map!

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleConditionInfo
text.text: The condition of %s has been update.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleAndImplementsConditionInfo
text.text: The condition of %s and all connected implements updated.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleMotorTempInfo
text.text: Motor temperature of %s changed to %s c.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleOperatingTimeInfo
text.text: Operating time of %s changed to %s h.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadVehicleInfo
text.text: Successfully reloaded XML and I3D for %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleAnalyseInfo
text.text: %s successfully analysed, check game log for more details.

text.name: easyDevControls_setPowerConsumerInfo
text.text: %s power consumer data has been updated (Synced to all vehicles: %s).

text.name: easyDevControls_setFillUnitFillLevelInfo
text.text: Successfully set fill unit %d of %s to %s with a fill level of %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleConditionHelp
text.text: Adds, removes or sets the selected condition percentage to an 'entered vehicle and all implements' or a 'single vehicle' in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleFuelHelp
text.text: Sets the fuel level of an entered vehicle or a vehicle in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleMotorTempHelp
text.text: Sets the motor temperature of an entered vehicle or a vehicle in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleOperatingTimeHelp
text.text: Sets the operating time of an entered vehicle or a vehicle in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_globalWiperStateHelp
text.text:
Set the global wiper state.
Rain sensor: Automatic operation (Standard). Off: Disabled in all weather conditions. States 1 to 10: Vehicle specific states for testing.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadVehicleHelp
text.text: Reloads the I3D and XML of the currently entered vehicle and all attached implements or a single vehicle in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_analyseVehicleHelp
text.text: Analyse a selected vehicle when entered or a vehicle in range of the player. Results will be printed to the log file.

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleDebugHelp
text.text: Toggles the following vehicle debug values.

text.name: easyDevControls_tensionBeltsDebugHelp
text.text: Toggles the debug tension belt rendering of all vehicles

text.name: easyDevControls_vehicleDistanceHelp
text.text: Shows the distance between all vehicles and the current camera.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllVehiclesHelp
text.text: Removes all vehicles and implements from the map.

text.name: easyDevControls_setPowerConsumerHelp
text.text: Sets the following properties of the powerConsumer specialisation.

text.name: easyDevControls_toggleCoverHelp
text.text: Toggles the cover of a selected vehicle when entered or a vehicle in range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_fillUnitFillLevelHelp
text.text: Updates a fillUnit with the given fill level and fillType.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadClosestPlaceableTitle
text.text: 重新加载最近的可放置位置

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointFillLevelInfo
text.text: Changed %s fill levels of '%s' on production point %s successfully.

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointFillLevelAllInfo
text.text: Changed all %s fill levels on %d %s successfully.

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointDistributingInfo
text.text: Distributing '%s' to the following production points:

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadPlaceablesInfo
text.text: Successfully reloaded XML and I3D of %d %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointHelp
text.text:
Allows the following changes to be made to the production points.
Categories: 1. All NPC Owned 2. All Farm Owned 3. Current Production Player Trigger 4. Individual IDs
Set Owner: - Sets the current owner.
Set State: - Sets the individual or global operating states of each production line.
Output Mode: - Sets the individual or global output mode to either 'Distributing' | 'Storing' | 'Selling'.
Fill Level: - Allows fill level changes to be made to individual or all input / output products depending on the category type being used. Litres or Percent values can be entered depending on the selection.

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointListHelp
text.text: Displays a list of production points on the map along with the following information.

text.name: easyDevControls_deliveryMappingHelp
text.text: Displays the current delivery mapping information for all distributing productions.

text.name: easyDevControls_productionPointDebugHelp
text.text: Displays production point debug information at each player trigger.

text.name: easyDevControls_showTestAreasHelp
text.text: Displays the test areas of all placeables.

text.name: easyDevControls_showPlacementCollisionsHelp
text.text: Displays the collisions for placement and ground levelling.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllPlaceablesHelp
text.text: Removes all standard removable placeables from the map.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllMapPlaceablesHelp
text.text: Removes all map bound placeables from the map including selling and buying points.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadPlaceableHelp
text.text: Reloads the I3D and XML of the closest placeable within a 30 meter range of the player.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadAllPlaceablesHelp
text.text: Reloads the I3D and XML of all placeables on the map.

text.name: easyDevControls_advanceGrowthInfo
text.text: Growth on all fields has been advanced to the next stage.

text.name: easyDevControls_advanceGrowthWarning
text.text:
Advancing growth stage is only available when the game setting '%s' is set to 'No'.
Would you like to change your current setting from '%s' to 'No' so this action can be performed?

text.name: easyDevControls_setGrowthPeriodInfo
text.text: Growth period on all fields updated to %s (%d).

text.name: easyDevControls_setGrowthPeriodWarning
text.text:
Setting growth period is not available when the game setting '%s' is set to '%s'.
Would you like to change your setting to 'No' so this action can be performed?

text.name: easyDevControls_setFarmlandOwnerAllInfo
text.text: Updated ownership of %d available farmlands to %s farm.

text.name: easyDevControls_setFarmlandOwnerInfo
text.text: Updated ownership of farmland %d to farm %s.

text.name: easyDevControls_refreshFieldOverlayInfo
text.text: Refreshing PDA field overlay and setting timer to 60 seconds.

text.name: easyDevControls_fieldSetFruitHelp
text.text: 允许对选定田地或所有田地的树叶进行以下更改.

text.name: easyDevControls_fieldSetGroundHelp
text.text: 允许对选定字段或所有字段的接地进行以下更改.

text.name: easyDevControls_fieldSetWarningHelp
text.text: 重要提示：使用基本字段定义更新字段。扩展或合并的字段可能被忽略或不完整.

text.name: easyDevControls_vineSetStateHelp
text.text: 允许在地图范围内调整所选葡萄树类型的生长阶段.

text.name: easyDevControls_vineUpdateVisualsHelp
text.text: 强制更新所有vine视觉效果.

text.name: easyDevControls_addRemoveWeedsHelp
text.text: 调整当前字段的删除增量.

text.name: easyDevControls_advanceGrowthHelp
text.text: 通过一个阶段促进所有叶片的生长.

text.name: easyDevControls_setGrowthPeriodHelp
text.text: 在给定的生长期内强制所有树叶生长.

text.name: easyDevControls_setFarmlandOwnerHelp
text.text: 允许根据“农田ID”或“田地编号”更改农田所有权'.

text.name: easyDevControls_refreshFieldOverlayHelp
text.text: 强制刷新地图上显示的字段覆盖数据.

text.name: easyDevControls_debugFieldStatusHelp
text.text: 显示给定半径处的所有字段状态数据.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadedEnvironmentDataInfo
text.text: 已从XML'%1！'重新加载完整的环境数据'

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadedWeatherDataInfo
text.text: 已从XML'%1！'重新加载天气数据'

text.name: easyDevControls_removeTireTracksInfo
text.text: 清除了播放器周围半径%s处的所有轮胎痕迹

text.name: easyDevControls_removeAllTireTracksInfo
text.text: 已从地图中删除所有轮胎痕迹

text.name: easyDevControls_seasonalShaderDebugInfo
text.text: 季节性着色器调试现在是%s

text.name: easyDevControls_environmentMaskDebugInfo
text.text: 环境掩码系统调试现在是%s

text.name: easyDevControls_setTimeHelp
text.text: 允许按月、月天数和小时提前时间。 注意：在此过程中不会调用更新更改侦听器，某些季节性更改只会在日更改时发生.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadedEnvironmentDataHelp
text.text: 从XML文件重新加载完整的环境。这允许在地图测试时进行更改和查看，而无需重新启动游戏.

text.name: easyDevControls_reloadedWeatherDataHelp
text.text: 仅从XML文件重新加载天气。这允许在地图测试时进行更改和查看，而无需重新启动游戏.

text.name: easyDevControls_setAddWeatherHelp
text.text: 允许添加或立即设置特定的天气类型。天气类型和变化将根据当前季节而变化.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeTireTracksHelp
text.text: 在给定半径处从地面上清除轮胎痕迹.

text.name: easyDevControls_weatherDebugHelp
text.text: 显示包含当前天气数据的图表.

text.name: easyDevControls_seasonalShaderDebugHelp
text.text: 显示当前季节着色器（cshared3）参数值.

text.name: easyDevControls_environmentMaskDebugHelp
text.text: 显示环境掩码调试值和状态.

text.name: easyDevControls_addSnowHelp
text.text: 将一层雪添加到地图中.

text.name: easyDevControls_removeSnowHelp
text.text: 从地图中删除所有地面雪.

text.name: easyDevControls_addSaltHelp
text.text: 在玩家周围的给定半径处添加盐.

text.name: easyDevControls_permissionsToolTip
text.text: 访问%s功能所需的最低播放机权限级别.

text.name: easyDevControls_permissionsHelp
text.text: 在此页面上，管理员可以定义玩家访问以下命令所需的权限级别.

text.name: easyDevControls_aboutInfo
text.text: Easy Development Controls被设计为modders、Mapper和内容创建者的测试工具。它还可以帮助您进行游戏设置或以您希望的方式进行游戏。 它包括一些已经通过游戏控制台命令提供的功能，但现在很容易访问，还添加了许多新功能。 大多数功能支持在多人游戏中使用，某些命令的权限级别也可以调整。现在还包括以前仅适用于主机的现有控制台命令。 还添加了一些生活质量特征，如下所示。 -传送：通过选择地图上的位置、字段编号或x/z坐标，在地图上快速移动自己或车辆。 -翻转车辆：允许用户轻松纠正车辆的垂直旋转。 -超强：增加玩家的载重量和捡拾范围。 -Hud可见性：显示和隐藏整个Hud，您还可以激活键绑定以更快地访问。 -显示捆位置：这将在地图上显示所有农场所有的捆。 -显示托盘位置：这将在地图上显示所有农场拥有的托盘。 -提前生长：将所有作物提前到下一个生长阶段。 随着功能数量的增加和许多新功能的规划，轻松的开发控制对每个人都有好处.
